description:
cmd/ld, cmd/5l: support R_ARM_PC24 and R_ARM_JUMP24, fix R_ARM_CALL

1. R_ARM_CALL can also be used to call a PLT entry
2. add support for R_ARM_PC24 and R_ARM_JUMP24
3. refactor, remove D_PLT32 in favor of D_CALL

Fixes issue 4006.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org, dave@cheney.net (cc: fullung@gmail.com, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8d25c35f12ee ***

cmd/ld, cmd/5l: support R_ARM_PC24 and R_ARM_JUMP24, fix R_ARM_CALL

1. R_ARM_CALL can also be used to call a PLT entry
2. add support for R_ARM_PC24 and R_ARM_JUMP24
3. refactor, remove D_PLT32 in favor of D_CALL

Fixes issue 4006.

R=rsc, dave
CC=fullung, golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6622057
